extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by retrieving the installed version of SAP Web Dispatcher, SAP Content Server, or SAP NetWeaver and ABAP Platform.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply SAP Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the Security Updates as detailed by the SAP Product Security Response Team to mitigate the vulnerability.
